abstract: Allan Kozinn reviews concert of works by Schumann, Franck and Bartok performed by violinist Christian Tetzlaff and pianist Lars Vogt at Alice Tully Hall.
snippet: The violinist Christian Tetzlaff and the pianist Lars Vogt took on Schumann, Franck and Bartok at Alice Tully Hall on Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: The violinist Christian Tetzlaff and the pianist Lars Vogt took on Schumann, Franck and Bartok at Alice Tully Hall on Wednesday.

headline.main: Leaving Bach in the Past, a Violinist Turns to Schumann, Franck and Bartok
headline.print_headline: Leaving Bach in the Past, a Violinist Turns to Schumann, Franck and Bartok
headline.seo: Christian Tetzlaff at Alice Tully Hall - Review
